summary.description:
A Publication-quality NGS Visualization Tool.

SparK - Publication quality NGS data plotting (Version 2.4.1).

SparK will exctract gene and transcript information from column 3 of the gff file.

||| NAME (SparK) SIMILAR TO (PUB. DIFFERENT) bio.tools/SPar-K (SPar-K)
